text: Pus musa (alh-e-salam) sakht ghazab naak hoker ranj kay sath wapis lotay aur kehnay lagay kay aey meri qom walo! Kiya tum say tumharay perwerdigar ney nek wada nahi kiya tha? Kiya iss ki muddat tumhen lambi maloom hui? Bulkay tumhara irada hi yeh hai kay tum per tumharay perwerdigar ka ghazab nazil ho? Kay tum ney meray waday ka khilaf kiya
